DOC.brief_summary: The project Visceral Leishmaniasis Malnutrition cohort study aim assess association malnutrition visceral leishmaniasis ( VL ) . It conduct Libo Kemkem Fogera district Amhara Regional State Ethiopia . Clinical , anthropometric , biochemical , immunological , parasitological sociodemographic data school age child VL high prevalence community collect December 2009 , May 2010 February 2011 .
DOC.brief_title: Visceral Leishmaniasis Malnutrition Amhara Regional State , Ethiopia
